generatedPrompts.frontCover: A charming cartoon watercolor of a slightly frazzled but happy sloth wearing a tiny party hat, precariously balancing a teetering stack of colorful, clumsily wrapped birthday presents. The sloth is hanging upside down from a tree branch, smiling cheekily at the viewer. Below the sloth, in the center of the card, the text "happy belated-ish birthday" is written in a beautiful, readable, flowing handwritten cursive script. The style is a flat 2D watercolor painting with soft, flowing colors, visible artistic brush strokes, a subtle paper texture background, and organic paint bleeds around the edges of the sloth and gifts.
generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist and sparse design for the back of a greeting card. A single, small, charmingly lopsided party hat, rendered in a simple flat 2D watercolor painting style, sits in the upper-left quadrant. The hat uses soft, flowing colors, with visible artistic brush strokes and organic paint bleeds at its edges. The background is a plain, subtle paper texture, leaving the bottom-right area completely empty for branding or a QR code. The overall composition is very clean, with about 20% visual decoration, maintaining a cohesive aesthetic with the front cover.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: A subtle and decorative background for the left interior of a greeting card. A cascade of colorful, abstract watercolor confetti shapes and delicate streamers gently falls from the top-left corner towards the bottom-right. The style is a flat 2D watercolor painting, characterized by soft flowing colors, visible artistic brush strokes, and a subtle paper texture. The elements have organic paint bleeds at their edges, creating a soft, artistic effect. The design is purely decorative with no text, covering about 40% of the panel, providing a gentle, festive atmosphere without overwhelming the space.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A minimalist decorative frame for the right interior panel of a greeting card, designed to leave ample open space for a handwritten message. A simple, elegant border of abstract watercolor splotches and soft-colored dots frames the top and bottom edges of the panel. The style is a flat 2D watercolor painting with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, and a subtle paper texture background. The decorative elements have organic paint bleeds, occupying only about 20% of the total area and ensuring the central space is clear, clean, and ready for writing.
